items.text: Deliver high-quality cross-platform apps using Flutter and Kotlin
Write scalable code with clean architecture patterns like MVVM and Bloc
Prioritize performance, visual consistency, and user-friendly interactions
Engineer responsive frontends with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS
Build robust APIs and backend services using Laravel, MySQL, and Firebase
Experience with AI-powered features, such as integrating LLMs into apps and chatbots
Collaborative workflows with Git and Figma
AI Language Model integrations (e.g., integrating AI with chatbots)
